metadata.title: CVE-2019-13616 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: SDL (Simple DirectMedia Layer) through 1.2.15 and 2.x through 2.0.9 has a heap-based buffer over-read in BlitNtoN in video/SDL_blit_N.c when called from SDL_SoftBlit in video/SDL_blit.c. USN-4238-1 addressed serveral vulnerabilities in SDL_image. This update provides the corresponding fixes for Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.

criterions.comment: libsdl1.2 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.15+dfsg2-5').
libsdl2 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.10+dfsg1-1ubuntu1').
libsdl2-image package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.5+dfsg1-2').
sdl-image1.2 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.12-12').
